name: @feegow/publicapi
description: Node package to use Feegow's Public API.

scripts.push-publish: npm publish && git add . && git commit -m "Update %npm_package_version%" && git tag -a %npm_package_version% -m "%npm_package_version%" && git push origin && git push origin %npm_package_version% && start https://github.com/feegow/feegow-public-api-node-package/releases/new?tag=%npm_package_version%

author: Gustavo Contreiras
